com.qtplaf.library.trading.data.indicators

Class PeriodIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.data.Indicator
      • com.qtplaf.library.trading.data.indicators.PeriodIndicator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExponentialMovingAverage, GaussianSmoother, SimpleMovingAverage, WeightedMovingAverage

    public abstract class PeriodIndicator
extends Indicator
    Base class for indicators that uses a period parameters
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      Returns the EMA data calculated from the begining to the argument index, when index is less that period.

      Returns a suitable period parameter.

      void start(java.util.List<IndicatorSource> indicatorSources)

      • calculate

        public abstract Data calculate(int index,
                               java.util.List<IndicatorSource> indicatorSources,
                               DataList indicatorData)
        Calculates the indicator data at the given index, for the list of indicator sources.

        This indicator already calculated data is passed as a parameter because some indicators may need previous calculated values or use them to improve calculation performance.

        Specified by:
        calculate in class Indicator
        Parameters:
        index - The data index.
        indicatorSources - The list of indicator sources.
        indicatorData - This indicator already calculated data.
        Returns:
        The result data.

        Parameters:

        indicatorSources - The list of indicator sources.
        Returns:
        The source data element.
